titleStmt.title: The true nature of imposture fully displayed in the life of Mahomet with a discourse annexed for the vindicating of Christianity from this charge / offered to the consideration of the deists of the present age by Humphrey Prideaux.
titleStmt.author: Prideaux, Humphrey, 1648-1724.

notesStmt.note: "A letter to the deists" not present in this copy.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
